title: Manchester United misfit Morgan Schneiderlin posts message to potential suitors as exit looms
text:
Manchester United misfit Morgan Schneiderlin posts message to potential suitors as exit looms The France international has only managed to clock 11 Premier League minutes this term Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Schneiderlin shows he's in shape as January exit looms Share this video Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester United misfit Morgan Schneiderlin has posted one final message prior to leaving the club he joined only last season - but who's it aimed at? 
The Frenchman, who was recruited by Louis van Gaal in the summer of 2015 for Â£25million, has been given the green light to leave by new boss Jose Mourinho . 
For one reason or another, the 27-year-old has failed to impress his new gaffer and has only clocked 11 Premier League minutes so far this term. Keeping his fitness up: Morgan Schneiderlin (Photo: Morgan Schneiderlin / Instagram) 
The January transfer window has only been open for five days and United have already turned down two bids for Schneiderlin. Neither offer met their valuation of the Frenchman. Morgan Schneiderlin has seen little playing time this term (Photo: Matthew Peters) 
On Wednesday evening, Schneiderlin posted a video to his Instagram and captioned the video with "Working hard". 
It's not clear whether United's number 28 is trying to ask his current boss for a second chance or whether he's trying to impress potential suitors. But with Mourinho's mind seemingly made up it's most likely going to be the latter option. poll loading Manchester United fans! Morgan Schneiderlin - keep or sell? 4000+ VOTES SO FAR
